markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dhampir Wizard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=116)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

This dhampir is a svetocher, the child of a moroi vampire.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Dhampir_DhampirWizard.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Dhampir Wizard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=116)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 95</row>

**Perception** +4; darkvision

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +8, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +5, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +5, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Vampire Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** +4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [spellbook containing their prepared spells](/Equipment.aspx?ID=53)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +6 

+2 circumstance to all saves vs. disease
</row>

**HP** 22
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Blood of the Night** The dhampir’s penalty and Hit Point reduction from the drained condition are reduced as though the condition value were 1 lower.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
staff +6 ([two-handed d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=198)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+2 piercing

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 18, attack +8
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Ray of Frost](/Spells.aspx?ID=245), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Grim Tendrils](/Spells.aspx?ID=141) (x2), [Magic Missile](/Spells.aspx?ID=180)

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-31" />
name: Dhampir Wizard
